modules.description: Provides event loop integration between Lwt and GTK by implementing Lwt_engine's required functions. Works with Lwt's promise and thread structures to enable asynchronous I/O within GTK applications. Enables non-blocking GUI interactions, such as loading data or performing network requests without freezing the interface.

Installs or removes integration between Glib and Lwt event loops, allowing control over which framework drives the other. Provides `iter` for non-blocking Glib event processing in multi-threaded environments and `wakeup` to interrupt blocked `iter` calls. Used to synchronize asynchronous I/O between Glib-based libraries and Lwt workflows.
